FuncDef: The display pki whitelist common-name command displays the whitelist file that stores whitelist data.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a common name.
It is a string of 1 to 63 case insensitive characters. Except the question mark (?) and space. However, when double quotation marks (") are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In whitelist-based IPsec certificate negotiation scenarios, when a user is required to implement whitelist data maintenance, for example, when a user is required to delete specific whitelist data, the user must obtain the whitelist file that stores the whitelist data. To query the whitelist file that stores whitelist data, run the display pki whitelist common-name command.
